experiences.description:
Started my career as a junior developer, involved in designing and implementing innovative solutions. 
 I was responsible for handling UI functionality and design for OTT platform.
 Tech used - VUEJS,SASS,CSS3,Javascript.

I was responsible for handling UI functionality and design for AFM website which was related to Aviation Flights .
 Worked on Real time Marathon which was mobile application . 
 Also ,worked on the HDFC bank scratch card and  card benefits UI design and Functionalities.
 Tech used - ReacJS,CSS3,Javscript,React Native,Nodejs.
